titleStmt.title: [Londons affright.] [...] pitty, to all people that shall heare of it in [...]ull fire that hapned on London-Bridge, the 11. [...] To the tune of, Aime not too high.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "It grieues my heart to write such heauy newes ..."
In two parts, printed side by side.
Imperfect: torn, affecting title, imprint, text, and two ill.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
